entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:50AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising This Week... Heavy rain fell overnight with between one half and one inch of accumulation. Rain will taper off by this afternoon. More rain is expected again from late tonight through Wed night, with heavy amounts possible, especially along the Alaska Range. This will result in most rivers seeing significant rises this week.
